outputs.output_descr: The DAS could directly support high priority frameworks, or initiatives therein, such as Country Programmes, SRFs, UNDAFs, pursuance of MDGs and Joint Programmes.  It is expected that with sufficient funding (i.e. critical mass), individual DAS facilities will be able to significantly enhance the substantive capacity of UNDP country offices to respond in a timely and flexible manner to the identified needs of governments for high priority, high impact, upstream advice in UNDP's major areas of focus.  As it is foreseen that the potential for mobilizing DAS resources will be increased in direct relation to the magnitude of the non-core programmes, the facility could also serve to enhance the consultative process between Resident Representatives, Governments and donors, especially with respect to the realignment and programming of core and non-core resources.

project_descr: The Development Advisory Services (DAS) funding facility will provide each country office with the ability to immediately establish a modality to support of both core and non-core financed upstream advisory/coordination services.
